dcterms:description: ART is the first large-scale benchmark dataset for abductive reasoning in narrative texts. It consists of approximately 20,000 pairs of observations with over 200,000 explanatory hypotheses, where observations are drawn from a collection of manually curated stories, and the hypotheses are collected by crowd-sourcing.
dcterms:title: ART
